content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stage.UnitMeasure (
    UnitMeasureCode varchar(50),
    Name nvarchar(100),
    ModifiedDate datetime
)
WITH (
        LOCATION='/FTH/UnitMeasure.tbl',
        DATA_SOURCE = AzureBlobStorage,
        FILE_FORMAT = CSVFileFormat,   
		REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,   
		REJECT_VALUE = 0
    )
;
